nodes.name: Valhalla
nodes.description: The main planet of the Nord colony. The inhabitants are hardy, but friendly and fair. Their beards and axes intimidate you, but they are space vikings after all.

nodes.name: Heimdall
nodes.description: Heimdall used to be the powerhouse of Nord industry, but centuries of strip-mining has left most of the world barren.

nodes.name: Idunn
nodes.description: While a busy trade hub bordering two empires, Idunn is also home to a hundred lakes and lush valleys.

nodes.name: Yggdrasil
nodes.description: Suitably named after the World Tree, Yggdrasil is covered by fertile farm-land, sheep and very bored people desperate for some exotic off-world trinkets.

nodes.name: Olympia
nodes.description: Capital of the Federation for five centuries, Olympus is a vibrant and fashionable trade hub.

nodes.name: Persephone
nodes.description: A lush and fertile agrarian planet on the border of Federation space.

nodes.name: Gaia
nodes.description: Gaia is a non-descript farming planet in the outskirts of Federation space.

nodes.name: Athena
nodes.description: Bordering the Renegade Cluster, Athena has a distinctively higher military presence than other Federation worlds

nodes.name: Deadalus
nodes.description: Deadalus is the center of ship and weapon production of the Federation.

nodes.name: Perseus
nodes.description: Home to only a few scattered research outposts, Perseus is maintaining a five decade streak as winner of the "Most Boring Planet of the Federation" award.

nodes.name: Gilgamesh
nodes.description: The barren deserts of Gilgamesh makes it a fitting capital for the Renegade Cluster

nodes.name: Nanshe
nodes.description: A blasted wasteland home to heavy industry and the sector's champion all-male poledancing team.

nodes.name: Nabu
nodes.description: While probably the safest planet in the Renegade Cluster, Nabu is still full of rough mercenaries and rogues giving you hard looks.

nodes.name: Ishtar
nodes.description: Ishtar is a remote mining planet known for its impressive diamond deposits.

nodes.name: Ninurta
nodes.description: A violent backwater within the Renegade Cluster with little resources to speak of.

nodes.name: Baldr
nodes.description: A remote and icy moon home to a few mining outposts and research facilities.
